scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev
scripts.bump:dev: npm install $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.devDependencies | keys) - .skipBump | .[]' | awk '{print $1 "@latest"}')
scripts.bump:prod: npm install --save-exact $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.dependencies | keys) - .skipBump | .[]' | awk '{print $1 "@latest"}')
scripts.docker:up: docker-compose -f docker-compose-wsl2.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose-wsl2.yml up --build --scale chrome=4
scripts.precommit:eslint:api: cd packages && cd api && npm run precommit:eslint
scripts.precommit:eslint:bundle: cd packages && cd bundle && npm run precommit:eslint
scripts.precommit:eslint:component: cd packages && cd component && npm run precommit:eslint
scripts.precommit:eslint:core: cd packages && cd core && npm run precommit:eslint
scripts.precommit:eslint:directlinespeech: cd packages && cd directlinespeech && npm run precommit:eslint
scripts.precommit:eslint:isomorphic-react-dom: cd packages && cd isomorphic-react-dom && npm run precommit:eslint
scripts.precommit:eslint:isomorphic-react: cd packages && cd isomorphic-react && npm run precommit:eslint
scripts.precommit:eslint:support-cldr-data-downl: cd packages && cd support && cd cldr-data-downloader && npm run precommit:eslint
scripts.precommit:eslint:support-cldr-data: cd packages && cd support && cd cldr-data && npm run precommit:eslint
scripts.precommit:eslint:test-harness: cd packages && cd test && cd harness && npm run precommit:eslint
scripts.precommit:eslint:test-page-object: cd packages && cd test && cd page-object && npm run precommit:eslint
scripts.precommit:typecheck:api: cd packages && cd api && npm run precommit:typecheck
scripts.precommit:typecheck:bundle: cd packages && cd bundle && npm run precommit:typecheck
scripts.precommit:typecheck:component: cd packages && cd component && npm run precommit:typecheck
scripts.precommit:typecheck:core: cd packages && cd core && npm run precommit:typecheck
scripts.start:docker: echo This command has been renamed to "npm run docker" && npm run docker
scripts.stop:docker: echo This command has been renamed to "npm run docker:down" && npm run docker:down
scripts.tableflip: npx lerna clean --yes --concurrency 8 && npx rimraf node_modules && npm ci && npm run bootstrap -- --concurrency 8
